name: To Number
description: Converts input to a number. Strings are parsed, booleans become 0/1.

outputs.name: errored
outputs.description: Input data if conversion failed (NaN, invalid)

settings.name: defaultValue
settings.label: Default on Error
settings.description: Value to use if conversion fails (set to emit on errored instead)

settings.name: useDefault
settings.label: Use Default on Error
settings.description: Use default value instead of routing to errored port
